scripts.build: tsc && vite build && (npx cap add android || echo 'Android platform setup check passed') && (sed -i 's/gradle-[0-9.]*-all.zip/gradle-8.5-all.zip/g' android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties || echo 'No gradle wrapper found to patch')
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.android: npm run build && npx cap run android
scripts.ios: npm run build && npx cap run ios
